title: Code Machine Build Plan
description: A schema for the todo.json file, which defines the build plan as a series of nested iterations and tasks.

task.description: Represents a single, atomic build task.

id.description: A unique identifier for the task (e.g., 'I1.T1').

description.description: A human-readable description of what the task will accomplish.

status.description: The current execution status of the task.

dependencies.description: A list of task IDs that must be completed before this task can start.

file_paths.description: A list of file paths that are expected to be created or modified by this task.

iteration.description: Represents a logical grouping of tasks and/or other iterations.

iteration_id.description: A unique identifier for the iteration (e.g., 'I1').

description.description: A human-readable description of the iteration's goal.

status.description: The overall status of the iteration.

tasks.description: A list of tasks belonging to this iteration.
